abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of construction of
            the 700 MW Salto Osorio Hydroelectric Plant on the Iguacu
            River in the State of Parana and 1,526 kms of 230 kv
            transmission lines interconnecting points in the three
            southern states of Brazil - Parana, Santa Catarina and Rio
            Grande do Sul. Due to favorable natural conditions the
            estimated cost per kw of Salto Osorio Plant is only $155,
            comparing favorably with the lowest cost plant recently
            built in Brazil. The project represents the most economic
            form in which additional generating capacity can be provided.
